sources.title: The Miner's Daughter (1950)
sources.description: A Harvard grad tries to start a gold claim, but is immediately beset by the amorous daughter of a rival miner. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-miners-daughter-1950/

metadata.Plot: Mining for gold with her father, Clementine is smitten with a snobby Harvard boy who comes prospecting across the river.
metadata.Writer: Bob Russell, Phil Eastman, Bill Scott
metadata.Actors: Jim Backus, Bill Scott, Harry Stanton
